item.title: Several bridges in Yadgir, Raichur come under river waters, villages are facing flood threat
item.description:

item.title: Part of ceiling collapses at Raichur bus stand, narrow escape for passengers
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: A part of the ceiling at the Raichur bus stand came crashing down on Tuesday, narrowly missing a KKRTC traffic controller and some passengers. A tense moment prevailed briefly after the incident.
Over the last three days, it has been raining continuously and the ceiling of the bus stand had become damp, leading to a part of it chipping off. This is the second time that the ceiling has collapsed at Platform 6 at the bus stand.
